modShortDescription: Adds the HD Forge to the game along with spikes, steel polish and titanium polish. You will also have 105 Slot Backpack & 10 Crafting Slots.
modDescription:
Adds the HD Forge to the game along with [spikes](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-spikes/), steel polish and titanium polish. You will also have 105 Slot [Backpack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/) & 10 Crafting [Slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) mod when you download this mod.
